sense.def:
Given
je pretekli deležnik glagola
to give
.

Datum ali čas, ki je
given
, je bil določen ali izbran vnaprej.

seg.quote: At a given moment we all cheered.

sense.def:
Če govorimo o
any given society
ali
any given moment
, mislimo na katerokoli družbo ali čas, ki ga lahko omenimo.

seg.quote: One cannot look at the problems of any given society in isolation from the rest of the world.
Often people don't know what's happening at any given moment.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
given a particular thing
, je pri tem treba upoštevati tisto stvar.

seg.quote: It seemed churlish to send him away, given that he only wanted to take photographs.
He was given to claiming that he was related to the Queen.
